data.eml:eml: A new species of Plaumanniola Costa Lima in French Guiana (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2018): A new species of Plaumanniola Costa Lima in French Guiana (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae). Zootaxa 4508 (3): 431-434, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4508.3.6
